review: This Fire Stick is awesome. A great lineup of apps and more are on the way. With Netflix, Plex, Hulu Plus, and now Sling TV available, I cancelled my cable subscription. I did notice it was hot after a few hours of use.
author: Joe

review: Overall, very pleased with the product.  There have been some connectivity issues and some buffering during the movies, but for the most part operation is satisfactory.
author: Philip Halpern

review: Bought this hoping it would handle Netflix better than our Wii u system.  We pretty much replaced the Wii u (with probably a thousand dollars worth of accessories and games) with just this little thing.  The free games are great for a 5 year old, and Netflix supports profiles (unlike the horrible Wii u app that somehow does not).
